reviewDetails.comment: Dr Shaw is so very friendly, and clearly cares about his patients. He saw me through my challenging pregnancy 2.5 years ago, and now continues to provide excellent gynecological care.

After 25 years of seeing bad gynocologists, l found Dr Shaw and he has been a godsend. He is always very personable and upbeat. Listens to any concerns l might have and explains everything clearly. And he always takes his patients on time. The day he retires will be a loss to the community.
Very great doctor. Pleasant, explain treatment for me to understand.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Daniels is outstanding.  Really cares about his patients.

I have been going to Dr. Daniels since I was in high school. The care and the time he spends with his patients is priceless. Because of his expertise he has been able to find concerns with my health that have saved me in so many ways. 
Yes the wait time is long but to me the care that I will be getting is totally worth the wait. I am so thankful that he is my doctor. Great Doctors are hard to come by.
He was the best face on me quickly and to care of my pain got me an appointment with an orthopaedic surgeon for the next morning

Dr. Michael Daniels saved my life at least twice and my wife's life maybe twice as well. His ability to really listen to you and diagnosis skills are the best. He paid attention and caught impending crises before they happened and thus were managed well.
He is also a genuinely nice person and his staff are excellent.
He is a caring doctor, listens to what you have to say, motivates you to make necessary changes that will make your health better.
I highly recommend Dr. Daniels. He was thorough and answered all the questions I had.
Takes his time with patients and is very thorough. Great general physician
He's very thorough and always willing to take the time to listen to any concerns you have.

Excellent Dr.

He is a wonderful doctor and person.  He really takes time to listen to you.

Dr. DiGrandi is a fine example of how a doctor should treat and approach his patients. Great bedside manner and he genially cares about his clients. Never rushed and he always answers questions. 
He is a credit to his profession!
Dr Di Grandi is terrific, always professional and takes the necessary time to understand the issues and proper medical solution. I would recommend him to anyone needing a dermatologist.
Always answers all questions, kind and considerate... on time

reviewDetails.comment: He is a great doctor who cares and goes above and beyond to show how much he cares. Unfortunately, the OPTUM service is not the best so I waited for a good amount of time to secure an appointment with him...the bureaucracy of the medical process is exacerbating at best - too bad doctors  have to succumb to so many rules and procedures.  These questionable rules create the need. for "vulnerable  patients" to have to jump through hoops to get medical care. It's a shame to see such a lack of empathy in the health care process. Does Optum fully comprehend the stress your procedures create? Do you understand how stress increases the need for medical interventions? You are shooting yourselves in the foot. When will you consider putting the person first?  It' too bad this will never be seen by anyone who can make a change - not sure why we are being asked to comment because nothing changes.
Very insightful and listened to how I was feeling.
He is a personable doctor and is concerned for his patients

Dr Burnette is no joke the greatest Dr in the world. He has saved my life and allay my fears about all sorts of health issues with always a smile!!

Dr. Burnette is the BEST.  He is the most personable medical professional I have ever come across.  I feel lucky to have crossed paths with him.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Hayashi is great! So wondering at explaining everything

Dr. Hayashi was great -- and the folks who work in her office are lovely, efficient and caring. She was on-time and really focused, and helped come up with an excellent solution for my issues. I would recommend her highly.

Dr. Hayashi is thorough and caring, and her staff are friendly and efficient.  But at times you have to wait for the doctor for an extended period of time because there is a queue of patients.  The patient appointment time spacing should be more generous.
She is such a wit.

The office is clean and safe. Dr. Hayashi walked me through all the questions and concerns I had carefully. The technician who was coaching her new colleague was really patient and thorough. 
I had a great experience at the office overall!
Her office is clean and hygienic. Dr. Hayashi and her assistants/technicians are friendly and also give patients detailed tests for eyes.

Dr. Hayashi is very informed and a very pleasant doctor to speak to.  She is also very knowledgeable and makes you feel at ease about any issues you may have. 

I highly recommend her.
